posts.message:
Is there an easier way to validate an Email ?
[a-z0-9_.-]+@[a-z0-9-]+\.[a-z]{2,3}(\.[a-z]{0,2})?

الموقع ده من أحسن الحاجات اللي ظهرت بعد ثورة الـ cloud computing ... كودينج عبارة عن web based IDE شغالة على أوبونتو فيرشوال ماشين، مجرد بتعمل أكونت وتحجز مساحة مجانية تشتغل عليها كانك على ترمينال الكمبيوتر الشخصي بتاعك بالظبط.

ومش بتحتاج أي installation لكومبايلرز عشان تشتغل بلغات كتيرة

(Ruby,C, C++, Go, Java, Node.js, Perl, PHP, Python) وغيره ...

الناس اللي في هندسة أو حاسبات، هيفيدكم جدا الموقع العظيم ده
Check out part 2 of the story. share it if you like it :)

posts.message: This is a good article i found on Hacker news, I'm a noob when it comes to emacs, still getting confused by key bindings and installing/uninstalling packages all the day
posts.caption: elephly.net
posts.description: I don’t usually try to explain tools that I use to other people, unless they made an explicit request as to how they could improve their workflow. However, since today is “I love Free Software” Day I think I should seize this opportunity and explain what draws me to GNU Emacs and how I use it.

posts.message:
Front-end Riddle:

how to force parent to take care of their children ? :P

What do you think of such a blockchain solution?
What do you suggest be the next step?
How can I test and validate an Email newsletter code to make sure it's viewed correctly on most email clients? --free tools are prefered--

What will be the order the functions will be executed in ?Do I have to draw a queue to keep track of them ? 
A solution, a hint or a link will be greatly appreciated.
ربنا يكفيكم شر ال-deadlock ويبعد عنكم ال-starvation 
Mohammad Badawy
When you're working on a side project (i.e. you have no team to brainstorm with) how, just /how/ do you find the right (or any) name for your project?
